name: NEONARCADE: adventure puzzle muse
description: NEON ARCADE: adventure puzzle quest - a game in which you have to go through many levels, overcoming various puzzles and obstacles. You will enjoy nice graphics, sound and unforgettable gameplay!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 160 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 170 MB available space
